input.sentences: the only way to get to this place was by taking a ferry ride across the lake .
the buildings there were very old and worn down . it looks like there has n't been activity here for years !
we get onto a roof of a building | and climb to the highest point .
we take a look at the surrounding landscape around us and see that it is very dense forest .
while walking around | we came across this sign . it was very ominous to see it in the forest .
output.sentences: We took a ride on a boat and stopped near some abandoned buildings.
We went inside one and it was spooky.
A sign outside pointed up and said "Over" with a big arrow pointing upwards.
So we climbed up on the roof and checked out our surroundings.
There was a strange sign but we couldn't read it so we headed back to the boat.
